column5: What is the tax rate for Ontario for camp rates? I thought 13.5% and remember when there was a credit but just curious as you add that on with the price of gas and now I know why Eck only eats fish all week.

Agreed. Things are not getting any cheaper on these trips for sure! Have not been to Anisinabi but sounds like I may need to keep on my radar and costs seem reasonable. I have made trips with Clarks but not to this particular lake and they do offer a good value for an outpost fly in with generally good fishing. We are always looking to try different lakes and outfitters. We had a tremendous trip with Slate Falls last Fall to Arc and looking forward to our time on Root Bay this summer.Still have a few soots to fill so reach out if interested.Good fishing to all regardless of where you end up this coming season!
Have a great trip and enjoy your stay.Thats what it's all about.Fishing on fly outs is always good and very peacefull

I see posts where some parties have gotten smaller and tough to find a spot for just couple of fisherman.Check this 2 person cabin out at Anishinabi Lake.My wife and i have stayed there a few times and its a great little cabin.Can have coffee on the deck and see the smallie s swimming around in the clear water.Fantastic fishing and the most comfortable boats around.17.5 Crestliner with a 25 4 stroke.There are also 3 other larger cabins all spread apart on the island.15 minute flight from Cedar Lake.If you want more remote thères the Williams narrow cabin.
Orrrrrrrrrrrr………you could join my group at Root Bay 7/15-7/23!!!!!!😎
prov1800, those cabins look awesome. One of these years I'll get up that way and enjoy all of the scenery up that way. I'm sure the fishing is awesome there too.

Very good.Main Lake has lots of lake trout and some huge pike and smallmouth and 5 walleye lakes you get to by atv.Couple of walk to walleye and another trout portage. Wont be bored there.very peacefully.
What's the prìce tag for root bay
I'm in for Root Bay in July if you need one (1) person. I might be able to find a second

Cost depends on number of people and number of days. We are 8 full days fishing/8 nights at Root Bay Outpost. The invoice attached is for our trip 7/15-7/23 and includes the extra days added (standard trip is 5 days/6 nights). Deposit is $300/person.
